segments.text: Oh , not too bad , but I've got to stay in bed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do more exercises after you are healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will . You have said that many times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you hungry ? Do you want me to buy something for you to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there â€™ s no need . Thank you all the same .
segments.speaker: S2
